plugins.name: solo-founder-superpowers
plugins.description: 43 expert skills for non-technical founders building SaaS with AI tools. Covers the full lifecycle: planning, design, build, database, integrations, AI features, security, testing, debugging, deployment, monitoring, plus marketing, pricing, growth, and business strategy.
